mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT IFNULL((SELECT auditLogin_id FROM AuditLogin_tbl WHERE alEntityType = #{alEntityType} AND alEntityTarget_id = #{alEntityTarget_id}), '') ) auditLogin_id , (SELECT IFNULL((SELECT alFailCount FROM AuditLogin_tbl WHERE alEntityType = #{alEntityType} AND alEntityTarget_id = #{alEntityTarget_id}), 0) ) alFailCount
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AuditLogin_tbl ( auditLogin_id, alEntityType, alEntityTarget_id, alFailCount, alDatetime, alIpAddress ) VALUES ( (SELECT auditLogin_id FROM (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(auditLogin_id) + 1, 10000) auditLogin_id FROM AuditLogin_tbl) tb), #{alEntityType}, #{alEntityTarget_id}, 1, now(), #{alIpAddress} )
mapper.update: UPDATE AuditLogin_tbl SET alFailCount = alFailCount + 1, alDatetime = now() WHERE auditLogin_id = #{auditLogin_id}
